Song.title: Give Me Jesus
Song.copyright: Adapted from “Take the World, But Give Me Jesus” by Fanny Crosby (1879). Music and additional words by David LaChance, Jr. © 2017 David Thomas LaChance (BMI)/Sovereign Grace Praise (BMI).

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [||: Gmaj7 | Cmaj7/G | Gmaj7 | Cmaj7/G :||]
VERSE 1: Take the [G]world, but give me J[C]esus; all its jo[G]ys are but a n[D]ame But His l[G]ove abides for[C]ever, through e[G]ternal [D]years the [G]sa[turn]me
TURN: [||: Gmaj7 | Cmaj7/G | Gmaj7 | Cmaj7/G :||]
VERSE 2: Take the [G]world, but give me J[C]esus, sweetest c[G]omfort of my [D]soul With my [Em]Savior watching [C]o’er me I can s[G]ing though b[D]illows r[G]oll. [| G]
CHORUS: Oh, the h[G]eight and depth of m[C]ercy! Oh, the [Em]length and breadth of l[C]ove Oh, the [G]fullness of rede[C]mption, pledge of [Em]endless life ab[C]ove Take this w[C]orld, my G[D]od’s e[Gmaj7]nough! [| Cmaj7/G | Gmaj7 | Cmaj7/G]
VERSE 3: Take the w[G]orld, but give me J[C]esus, in His cr[G]oss my trust shall [D]be Till with c[Em]learer, brighter v[C]ision, face to f[G]ace my [D]Lord I s[G]ee
CHORUS: Oh, the h[G]eight and depth of m[C]ercy! Oh, the [Em]length and breadth of l[C]ove Oh, the [G]fullness of rede[C]mption, pledge of [Em]endless life ab[C]ove Take this w[C]orld, my G[D]od’s e[Gmaj7]nough! [| Cmaj7/G | Gmaj7 | Cmaj7/G]
BRIDGE: Take this [G]world and give me J[C]esus, in His c[Em]ross my trust shall b[C]e Take this [G]world and give me J[C]esus, till that [Em]day my Lord I s[C]ee [2X]
TAG: Take this w[C]orld, my [D]God’s en[Em]ough, Take this w[C]orld, my [D]God’s e[G]nough
